name: Digital Multimeter
description: A high-accuracy digital multimeter for measuring voltage, current, and resistance in electrical systems.

name: Insulated Screwdriver Set
description: A set of insulated screwdrivers designed for working on live electrical circuits up to 1,000 volts.

name: Wire Stripper and Cutter
description: A reliable wire stripper and cutter with ergonomic handles and multiple gauge stripping slots.

name: Voltage Tester Pen
description: A non-contact voltage tester pen with LED indicators for quickly detecting live wires.

name: Electrical Tape Set
description: A set of durable and flame-resistant electrical tapes in multiple colors for wire insulation and coding.

name: Conduit Bender
description: A heavy-duty conduit bender for precise bending of electrical conduits with marked degree scales.

name: Cable Pulling Fish Tape
description: A 50-foot durable fish tape for guiding wires and cables through walls, conduits, and tight spaces.

name: Electrical Crimping Tool
description: A professional-grade crimping tool for securely attaching connectors to electrical wires.
